group_1.textRight: Witches are creatures that bring disaster@to the world.

group_1.textLeft: Witches...

group_1.narration: That "encounter," as evoked by the Memory Museum...
The existence of "Magical Girls"@profoundly altered my destiny.
The Kashin-style school of flower arrangement,@preserved by my family for generations,@was usurped by senior disciples after my father fell ill.
The one phrase my bedridden father drilled into me,@again and again, like a curse, was:
I intended to do just so.@Though at the time, I believed it would be a@long road, one that would take many years.
However, my encounter with Kyubey@drastically shortened that path.
Upon forming a contract as a Magical Girl and gaining power,@I began my revenge on the senior disciples.

group_1.textLeft: You came, Sasao.
Of all the senior disciples of the Kashin-style school,
you were the one who studied under my father@the most diligently.
And yet...you joined the others in seizing control@of the Kashin-style school.
From this point forward, I intend to take revengeâ€•
on you, and the other senior disciples.

group_1.textRight: And...how do you intend to carry that out?

group_1.textLeft: I intend to kill every last one of you.
...Perish the thought,@I wouldn't resort to such brutality.
I've considered several approaches, but there's@something I must do first.
That's why I summoned you here, Sasao.

group_1.textRight: W-what are you going to do...?

group_1.textLeft: Why did you betray the head family?
I'd like to hear the details in full.
If I'm to begin, that's where I must start.
And besides... Sasao.
You feel guilty about it too, don't you?
Your presence here in response to my@summons is proof enough.

group_1.textRight: You'd be better off giving up on this revenge.
You're still just a fifteen-year-old girl.
Whether or not you bear the Kashin name,@that doesn't change.
The only reason I came here is because I pitied you.
The Kashin school is already beyond your reach.

group_1.textLeft: ...Sasao.
It's certainly true that until now,@I had no power of my own.
But now...that's changed.
Now...
